name: A lark among stars
description:
A game made for the HackYeah game jam November 2020.

====Description====

Control the lark and avoid incoming obstacles in order to reach the lark's goal: the moon! Type out the words in the terminal to help him maneuver out of life-endangering situations! 

====Controls====

- AWSD to control the bird.

- E and Q to dash right and left respectively.

- If you encounter an object, you must type out the words in read to avoid the obstacle.
